        // Heap functions
        Heap* create_heap(int capacity) {
            Heap *heap = (Heap*)malloc(sizeof(Heap));
            heap->arr = (HeapElement*)malloc(capacity * sizeof(HeapElement));
            heap->size = 0;
            heap->capacity = capacity;
            return heap;
        }

        void heap_push(Heap *heap, int deg, int node) {
            if (heap->size == heap->capacity) {
                // expand, but we hope not.
                return;
            }
            heap->arr[heap->size].deg = deg;
            heap->arr[heap->size].node = node;
            heap->size++;
            heapify_up(heap, heap->size-1);
        }

        HeapElement heap_pop(Heap *heap) {
            HeapElement top = heap->arr[0];
            heap->arr[0] = heap->arr[heap->size-1];
            heap->size--;
            heapify_down(heap, 0);
            return top;
        }

        void heapify_up(Heap *heap, int index) {
            while (index > 0) {
                int parent = (index-1)/2;
                if (heap->arr[parent].deg > heap->arr[index].deg) {
                    HeapElement temp = heap->arr[parent];
                    heap->arr[parent] = heap->arr[index];
                    heap->arr[index] = temp;
                    index = parent;
                } else {
                    break;
                }
            }
        }

        void heapify_down(Heap *heap, int index) {
            while (1) {
                int left = 2*index+1;
                int right = 2*index+2;
                int smallest = index;
                if (left < heap->size && heap->arr[left].deg < heap->arr[smallest].deg) {
                    smallest = left;
                }
